<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Amnemonic Charm](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2096)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 92 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 140 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You fail or critically fail a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5), [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6), or [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check to [Coerce](/Actions.aspx?ID=52), [Lie](/Actions.aspx?ID=47), [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50), or [Request](/Actions.aspx?ID=51)

**Requirement** You're a master in the skill you failed with.
</row>

</column>

---

This ornate locket, usually containing a faceless, humanoid portrait, is typically worn on a chain around the neck or attached to your clothing. When activated, the charm casts a DC 26 [_modify memory_](/Spells.aspx?ID=200) spell against a single target of the check, removing all memory of your failed attempt and potentially allowing you to make another attempt. The effect can't remove more than 3 minutes of memories from its target.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Amnemonic Charm
requirement: You're a master in the skill you failed with.
